messages.subject: Re: Byakkotai + Hijikata  "Bushido"
messages.msgSnippet: Tried to download the free trial but it won t connect (for the second download to get the manga). Hmmm yes that would make a lot of sense since in other movies
messages.messageBody:
Tried to download the free trial but it won't connect (for the
second download to get the manga).

Hmmm yes that would make a lot of sense since in other movies we did
see younger blood go up to Goryokaku. The description of the manga
is a little misleading though... "The battle of the samurai who have
turned their backs on the new era begins now!"
